name: Tactical War
description:
In Tactical War, you have a 7-Warrior army under your control.


Warriors include Sword Master, Mermaid, Dumbo, Archer, Rifle Master and etc.

Of course, this is only a part of Warriors in game. Currently you can select your favorite Warriors from 14 different heroes. After selecting the desired heroes, you must choose the best place for them on the ground to gain more power. This high selection power puts a lot of different strategies in front of you.

We want to give you the good news that in this game you can compete with other players like yourself online.

So choose the most effective Warriors. Set them in the best places on the ground and go to the battle of the opponents.


Game Features:
-Compete in 1-on-1 turn-based battles!
-Get new heroes -Set up and discover new strategies!
-Upgrade your warriors!
-Get awesome rewards and chests!
And more fun, cool features!
